template.value:
<?php namespace unit;

use Ditto\Ditto as d;
use Mockery as m;
use $MODEL_NAME$;

class $MODEL_NAME$Test extends \TestCase {
	/**
	 * @var \$MODEL_NAME$
	 */
	protected $model;

	/**
	 * @var \Ditto\Ditto
	 */
	protected $spec;

	public function setUp()
	{
		parent::setUp();

		$this->model = new $MODEL_NAME$();
		$this->spec  = d::make($this->model);
	}

	//==========================================================================
	// Initialisation
	//==========================================================================

	public function testItIsInitializable()
	{
		$this->spec->shouldHaveType('$MODEL_NAME$');
	}
}
